mapper.insert: insert into team_todolist(task_content, task_type, task_createtime, task_finishtime) values(#{task_content},0,null,null);
mapper.update: update team_todolist set task_content=#{task_content} where task_id = #{task_id};
update team_todolist set task_type = case when task_type=1 then 0 when task_type =0 then 1 end where task_id = #{task_id}
mapper.delete: delete from team_todolist where task_id = #{task_id} and task_type =#{task_type};
